name: Ugandan Knuckles Escape 2
description:
DO YOU KNOW DA WAE???? Fight for your life as these dead memes come for you! They want to know the way to their queen and they think you know where she is.

This is a simple run and gun, coin collection game. It was created a few years ago and I am just now publishing. This was my first attempt at game development using Unity's Game Engine and C#. Being my first attempt, it is very rough, not great controls and the lack of a pause menu. I have since learned much more and have Ugandan Knuckles Escape 3 on the way!

I do not claim any assets used. All assets were acquired via royalty free downloads.
